articles.author: Jeremy C. Owens
articles.title: Nvidia calls off $40 billion acquisition of Arm: report - MarketWatch
articles.description: Marriage of graphics-chip specialist and semiconductor designer called off after opposition by U.S. and Europe regulators
articles.content:
Nvidia Corp. is giving up on its attempt to acquire Arm Ltd. from Softbank Group Corp., which said Tuesday that it will instead take the spurned chip designer public.Nvidia

articles.author: Sophie Collins
articles.title: Meta admits it may have to shut down use of Facebook and Instagram in Europe - Irish Mirror
articles.description: "We will likely be unable to offer a number of our most significant products and services, including Facebook and Instagram in Europe"
articles.content:
The parent company that oversees Facebook and Instagram globally says both social media platforms may have to be shut down across Europe.
